entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 9.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
